text.content:
# åˆ›å»º VM å®ä¾‹
gcloud compute instances create zhuge-vm \
  --zone=us-west1-b \
  --machine-type=e2-standard-4 \
  --boot-disk-size=50GB \
  --boot-disk-type=pd-ssd \
  --image-family=ubuntu-2204-lts \
  --image-project=ubuntu-os-cloud \
  --metadata=startup-script='#!/bin/bash
    # å®‰è£… Docker
    curl -fsSL 281 | sh
    
    # æ‹‰å–é¢„æ„å»ºé•œåƒ
    docker pull your-registry/yi-6b-server:latest
    
    # å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡
    docker run -d -p 8080:8080 \
      --name zhuge-server \
      your-registry/yi-6b-server:latest
  '

# åˆ›å»ºé˜²ç«å¢™è§„åˆ™
gcloud compute firewall-rules create allow-yi-server \
  --allow=tcp:8080 \
  --source-ranges=0.0.0.0/0 \
  --target-tags=yi-server

text.content:
FROM python:3.11-slim

WORKDIR /app

# å®‰è£… llama.cpp ä¾èµ–
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
    build-essential \
    cmake \
    git \
    wget

# å…‹éš†å¹¶ç¼–è¯‘ llama.cpp
RUN git clone 282 && \
    cd llama.cpp && \
    mkdir build && cd build && \
    cmake .. && make -j$(nproc)

# ä¸‹è½½ Yi-6B æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆGGUF INT8ï¼‰
RUN wget 283/yi-6b-q8_0.gguf \
    -O /app/models/yi-6b.gguf

# å®‰è£… Python ä¾èµ–
COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install -r requirements.txt

COPY . .

EXPOSE 8080
CMD ["python", "

COPY . .

text.content:
from fastapi import FastAPI
from llama_cpp import Llama
import asyncio

app = FastAPI()

# åŠ è½½æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§åŠ è½½ï¼‰
model = Llama(
    model_path="/app/models/yi-6b.gguf",
    n_ctx=4096,
    n_threads=4,
    n_gpu_layers=0  # CPUæ¨ç†
)

@

import asyncio

app = FastAPI()

# åŠ è½½æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§åŠ è½½ï¼‰
model = Llama(
    model_path="/app/models/yi-6b.gguf",
    n_ctx=4096,
    n_threads=4,
    n_gpu_layers=0  # CPUæ¨ç†
)

@

text.content:
("/generate")
async def generate(prompt: str, role: str):
    # æ ¹æ®è§’è‰²è®¾ç½®ä¸åŒçš„ temperature
    temp_map = {
        "architect": 0.7,
        "adversary": 0.8,
        "realist": 0.7,
        "chaos": 1.5
    }
    
    output = model(
        prompt,
        max_tokens=512,
        temperature=temp_map.get(role, 0.7),
        top_p=0.95
    )
    
    return {"role": role, "output": output["choices"][0]["text"]}

rich_text.plain_text:
("/generate")
async def generate(prompt: str, role: str):
    # æ ¹æ®è§’è‰²è®¾ç½®ä¸åŒçš„ temperature
    temp_map = {
        "architect": 0.7,
        "adversary": 0.8,
        "realist": 0.7,
        "chaos": 1.5
    }
    
    output = model(
        prompt,
        max_tokens=512,
        temperature=temp_map.get(role, 0.7),
        top_p=0.95
    )
    
    return {"role": role, "output": output["choices"][0]["text"]}
